api_list.name: RChilli NER Tagger
api_list.description:
RChilli NER Tagger API extracts the entity details from the given text.

Entity details like start location, end location, job, city, state, country, name, degree, org, skill, date, and year.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-ner-tagger.p.rapidapi.com/nerTagger"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-ner-tagger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
